wiki.content: "Weak And Powerless" is the first single by the alternative rock band A Perfect Circle, from their second album, Thirteenth Step. It is their highest charting single to date, reaching #1 on both the Modern Rock Tracks and Mainstream Rock Tracks. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Weak And Powerless" is the first single by the alternative rock band A Perfect Circle, from their second album, Thirteenth Step. It is their highest charting single to date, reaching #1 on both the Modern Rock Tracks and Mainstream Rock Tracks.

track.name: Weak And Powerless
comments: @Kodjak, for me, this whole album is a fall/early winter album.  It was a huge part of my life during a major metamorphosis in that time period.  "Mer de Noms" and "Thirteenth Step" each harbor both angels and demons that greet me as I journey through them.
Have anyone noticed the peak of listing to this song is near valentine's day?
Little angel go away, come again some other day. The devil has my ear today, I'll never hear a word you say,. He promised I would find a little solace, And some piece of mind.............
DESPERATEEEEEEEEE SO WEEEEEEEAAAAKKK ANNNNNNDDD POWERLESS over you....
The videoclip for this song is absolutely memorable too
Beautiful
i'm so weak and powerless over you  )2(=
it has that disturbed, desperate feel
Part of my "woe is me" playlist on Spotify/Facebook. Consider joining these groups: OVER THE PRETENCE and I'm British, but I have this thing for American music...
